import React, { FunctionComponent } from 'react'; import './style.css' type Props = { request: Function } const SkinForm: FunctionComponent = ({ request }) => { var objectField: any = { coiffe: '', cape: '', bouclier: '', costume: '', familier: '' } var colorField: any = { peau: '', cheveux: '', habit1: '', habit2: '', habit3: '' } var valuePicture: string = "" var valueClasse: string = "" const classList: string[] = [ 'Zobal', 'Iop', 'Sram', 'Ouginak', 'Eniripsa', 'Steamer', 'Enutrof', 'Cra', 'Roublard', 'Sacrieur', 'Eliotrope', 'Xelor', 'Pandawa', 'Feca', 'Forgelance', 'Osamodas', 'Sadida', 'Ecaflip' ]; const handleInputChangeColor = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { colorField = { ...colorField, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }; } const handleInputChangeObject = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { objectField = { ...objectField, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }; } const handleInputChangeURL = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { valuePicture = e.target.value } const handleInputChangeClasse = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { valueClasse = e.target.value } const handleInputReset = (e: React.FormEvent) => { colorField = { peau: '', cheveux: '', habit1: '', habit2: '', habit3: '' }; objectField = { coiffe: '', cape: '', bouclier: '', costume: '', familier: '' }; } const initRequest = () => { const newSkinPart = { classe: valueClasse, picture: valuePicture, color: [colorField.peau, colorField.cheveux, colorField.habit1, colorField.habit2, colorField.habit3], object: [objectField.bouclier, objectField.cape, objectField.coiffe, objectField.costume, objectField.familier] } request(newSkinPart) } return (
handleInputReset(e)}>
